amendment.description: An amendment numbered 426 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to allow for admission of essential scientists and technical experts to promote and protect the national security innovation base.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows for admission of essential scientists and technical experts to promote and protect the national security innovation base.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A035) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 341).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 201 (Roll no. 341).
